PersonalizationTargetInfo.name: PersonalizationTargetInfo
PersonalizationTargetInfo.description: Represents a target for an audience.

ContainerId.description: ID of the Experience Cloud site or org that contains the target.

GroupName.description: Group name of the target. Groups bundle related targets.You can have up to 2,000 groups and 500 targets per group.

TargetValue.description: Value of the target. For ExperienceVariation, this is the developer name of the Experience Variation or the record ID for the object.
